outputs.output_descr:
To provide administrative and technical assistance to the newly established Anti-Corruption Academy, particularly with a view to enabling capacity building and knowledge development for the country's anti-corruption agencies.
-Output :
1- Anti-Corruption Academy has sustainable organizational arrangements
2- Relevant resources for the Anti-Corruption Academy are in place.
3-Anti-Corruption Academy ability and capacity to deliver training established.

project_descr: This project will provide administrative and technical assistance to the newly established Anti-Corruption Academy, particularly with a view to enabling capacity building and knowledge development for the country's anti-corruption agencies.
project_title: Institutional Dev of Anti Corruption Academy
